subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Call Raheem Brock and Dan Klecko of the Indianapolis Colts and Jason McKie of the Chicago Bears the Temple trio, three former college teammates having an unlikely reunion at Super Bowl XLI.
snippet: Call Raheem Brock and Dan Klecko of the Indianapolis Colts and Jason McKie of the Chicago Bears the Temple trio, three former college teammates having an unlikely reunion at Super Bowl XLI.
